title: Poor ping only in league everything else is fine
body: i haven't been able to play league in like a month now, am a student so i live in accommodation and the internet is not bad, about a month ago i could play league no problem few lag spikes but nothing to bad, recently ive tried to play and i have 200 ping all the time, but when i check everything else its fine, i have 20 ping on discord, i can watch videos and streams no problem, so i dont know what is causing league to lag.

replies.body: There might be something sort of blocking your connection with only our game servers if you're still able to connect with everything else just fine! Do me a favor and try the lag report tool AoA Nel mentioned, or you could also run a quick traceroute to our EUW servers at 185.40.65.1 using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/), and that data will give me a good idea of what's going on!

I to am having this problem from Austin, TX. I used the lag report tool where you can drag in the log file for the past week it was all at 96 and the past 3 days its dropped to a 20 or lower. We use Spectrum (Time Warner Cable) and are almost always at a 39 ping
